title: A RESOLUTION ADOPTING THE SANGGUNIANG BARANGAY MALINTA, RESOLUTION NO. 009-2025, DATED JULY 21, 2025, ENTITLED “A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE TEMPORARY CLOSURE OF THE ENTIRE STRETCH OF SERVICE ROAD IN BARANGAY MALINTA, LOS BANOS, LAGUNA FOR THE CONDUCT OF INDAK SA KALYE 2025 ON AUGUST 10, 2025 FROM 12:00 NN TO 6:00 PM AND COLOR FUN RUN ON AUGUST 14, 2025 FR 5:00 AM TO 10:00 AM IN CELEBRATION OF ONE BARANGAY ONE MAALINTA FESTIVAL 2025 IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE FEAST OF SAN ROQUE” ﬁ;‘ida Author i Councilor Bghedi
